arabic.title: اتخنقت
text: رجعت للصفر من مكان ما بدأت

english.title: Itkhan2t
text: I realized that i was wasting time
It was a daydream and i believed
My dream was killing me slowly
It made me lost for words/ can't speak
I become frustrated and get lost
Was it a bad choice or
i've come back to the zero where I've started
There is someone who saw his reality
and other one who didn't see

text: you're capable you can do it,and forget your love
the betrayal is your attitude,living inside you

the betrayal is your attitude,living inside you
you're capable,you can do it and go and leave me
you kill my longings and love again
go away i won't cry again over the nights
go away,enough,it's a mistake i'm paying for
go away i won't cry again over the nights
go away,enough,it's a mistake i'm paying for

go away i won't cry again over the nights
go away,enough,it's a mistake i'm paying for
go away i won't cry again over the nights

english.title: Leh befakaroni fik
text: why do your eyes remind me.?
why do they talk to me about you?
why do they send me back to you?
and I stay awake for you , nights and nights
You mean that I come back to you?
and return to complain about my horrible situations?
and to my love stories which used to call you
Along time , I've found you forgetting my love , and forgetting my yearning
where is it? where is it? in the love and yearning?
Don't let us thursty after sending us up there
ooooh my god from his torment ,ooh
why do your eyes remind me.?
why do they talk to me about you?
why do they send me back to you?
and I stay awake for you , nights and nights
You mean that I return back to you?
and return to complain about my horrible situations?
ooh , the same feelings will come back
ooh the yearning is still exsisting
when it told me that it forgot her
and I ask myself If I go back
even If I think about it
and to my love stories which used to call you
Along time , I've found you forgetting my love , and forgetting my yearning
where is it? where is it? in the love and yearning?

ooooh my god from his torment ,ooh
why do your eyes remind me.?
why do they talk to me about you?
why do they send me back to you?
and I stay awake for you , nights and nights

arabic.title: مظلوم
text: كل شي في الدنيا له حد
كل شئ فى الدنيا له حل

english.title: Downtrodden
text: do you like what's after us(our relationship)?
you're leaving us and turning around,come let's blame each other
blame me ,may be i'm downtrodden downtrodden ,may be i'm donwtrodden
no threatening,account me if you'll go and leave me ,come to account each other ,blame me may be i'm downtrodden ,downtrodden
i'm downtrodden , i'm downtrodden , i'm downtrodden
stop fooling around,and your plays and why did you keep on play it on me ,why do you hide your face when you see me
go straightly with le ,i 'll be thankful to you,if there are words to say so blame maybe i'm i'm downtrodden ,maybe i'm i'm downtrodden
i don't need help from you,i wish you all happiness,cruelity is your attitude
blame maybe i'm i'm downtrodden ,maybe i'm i'm downtrodden
everything in this world has a solution,don't listen to any one and blame maybe i'm i'm downtrodden ,maybe i'm i'm downtrodden

english.title: Wala Hases Beaman
text: fare well after you is faster
i hate life after you i can't countiue
i'm living and waiting for you in my heart
and my life stoped on you
and my eyes asking me when are they going to see you
forget you as fast as i can
i find myslef missing you more
and when i try not to think of you i find myself thinking of you
i'm living and waiting for you in my heart and my life stoped on you and my eyes is asking me when are they going to see you

arabic.title: بحبك
text: تبقي في شرق هتبقي في غرب
اه يا انا يا انا يجي ميت مليون
شيرين: وانت اللى انا حسيت وياه
ان انا عايشة في احلى حياة
شيرين: وانا لو حتى رحيلك طال
وانا لو حتى قبلت ألوف بحبــــــــــــــــك
شيرين: وانا لو الف الدنيا واطوف

english.title: I Love You
text: Mohie: You and only you are my fate
And days after you being gone cannot be felt
More than you by one time and a half
Sherine: You are the love of my heart and eyes
You are the world and love
If you are in the East or in the West,
Mohie: Once you called me, you gave the world
a shape, a flavor, a meaning and a color
Oh my, oh my, Around a million
Sherine: And you are the one with whom I felt
that I'm living the sweetest life
Oh yes, darling, I love you, yes
Mohie: When I'm away from home, when I'm traveling around
Your love is on my mind and in my thoughts
My heart has never told someone else other than you:
Sherine: And even if your absence goes on long
Even if they pant the world for me in hopes
Even if they bring me treasures of riches
Mohie: My heart is always aching for you
Your love is like air, necessary
And even if I met thousands [of others], I love you
Sherine: And even if I went around the world and circled round
I swear I would never find tenderness like yours
I never feel any fear when I'm with you
